PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-00842017-02-03TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectVessel Fire Safety Regulations
PrecisVESSEL FIRE SAFETY REGULATIONS in order to (1) prevent the occurrence of fire and explosion on vessels; (2) reduce the risk to life caused by fire on vessels; (3) reduce the risk of damage caused by fire to a vessel, its cargo and the environment; (4) contain, control and suppress fire and explosion on the vessel in the compartment of origin; (5) provide adequate and readily accessible means of escape for passengers and crew on vessels in case of fire; and (6) ensure harmonization with current international structure and requirements with respect to fire safety on vessels.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0014 Publication Date: 2017-02-22
